Poetic Translation: Comes the nightingale with her song
And she sings her song even now.
The snow keeps on falling down.

Lyrics: あわれ　そこよしや
Poetic Translation: Oh, alas! for here where I am,
The snow keeps on falling down.

Transliteration: Markham, Elizabeth. Saibara: Japanese Court Songs of the Heian Period. Vol. 2. Cambridge: Cambridge UP, 1983. Print.
